Orem.Samuel Green House:
The Samuel Green House is a historic house located at 264 East 200 South in Pleasant Grove, Utah.


== Description and history ==
It is "a two-story soft-rock vernacular house with a hall-parlor plan and a gable roof," built in about 1870. The house has a symmetrical three-bay facade with a central door flanked by 6/6 double-hung windows.
